website_summaries.verdict: Worth a shot if you're looking for a natural leave-in conditioner, but it may not moisturize as well as the others.
cons: Some have said it dried their hair out instead of moisturizing

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT GIOVANNI DIRECT LEAVE IN CONDITIONER!!! THIS IS A COMPLETE FRAUD!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT GIOVANNI DIRECT LEAVE IN CONDITIONER!!! THIS IS A COMPLETE FRAUD!! I use this product all the time and what I received from you is too thick, has a nasty scent, and the color is different!!! I would like my money back!!! There could be anything in these bottles, this is not what I paid for!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: **FAKE**
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first big bottle of this stuff at Walmart. Loved it so much I bought this 3-pk because I knew I would continue to use it. Too bad I just ran out of my big bottle yesterday only to find out these bottles are filled with lotion!! Not even a good lotion at that! Should have know since the price was good, but since it was Amazon just assumed it would be legit. Can’t get a refund because my authentic bottle lasted longer than I thought it would so guess I’m just taking a lesson away from this order...*eye roll*
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the REAL Stuff - use Caution!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife a while back after we moved away from a store that sold the ACTUAL product locally. Unfortunately was not the same, not even close. Wife is not happy at all and now I'm having to drive 60 miles to get the real stuff. Bad deal because I had bought 2 big bottles of this and thought it was a huge win. Mistake! Many posting stellar reviews probably don't realize the difference if they've never used the real product but my wife demonstrated the difference between the 2 and she's right! She's always right! Much more silky and soft both the product and the result! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Beware- This is not the product that should be in this bottle
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this product in the correct container, but when comparing it to the last of my other bottle, it becomes very obvious that this product has been switched for something cheap and nasty. It is watery, ineffective and has a totally different smell. I have used this conditioner for a very long time and have always loved it. Sad that I bought from someone doing shady things.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda S.

customer_reviews.title: Works and does not smell.
customer_reviews.text: It is not exactly WEIGHTLESS but it works and I feel the moisture stayed in my hair. This is really what attracted me to this product (I have dry hair). This also has no SMELL -- which is what I really like. Products often say "fragrance free" when they mean no PERFUME but then you walk around smelling like coconut or pineapples (which is just as smelly). I work in office spaces where visitors come in and their heavy perfumes can be OBNOXIOUS. I find it offensive to be wafting scents in common work spaces, hospitals, labs and community centers. So I am relieved whenever I find some hair products that work without SMELLING.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Dewolf

customer_reviews.title: 🤢🤮🤮🤮 at the smell
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this leave in because of all of the curly girls who rave about it. I just washed my hair and applied the leave in, my hair is still wet as I write this so I don't know of it's good for my hair or not. I'm writing this now because this stuff STINKS HORRIBLY. It smells like the blue stuff they put into portajohns. My hair smells like I dunked it in the bowl of a portable sh*thouse. I don't have sensitivity to smells, except this one 🤢
customer_reviews.author: Frogmedic

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, fraud, not the real thing.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I am African American and have 4b/4c hair texture. This product worked horribly on my hair. My hair felt hard and dry after using it, not moisturizing at all. Also I am about 99% this isn’t the actual Giovanni leave in. I’ve used this product before and it was a completely different consistency and texture from when I would buy it in store. I believe this product is a fraud and not the actual Giovanni leave in conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: victoria wilson

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite conditioners. I have natural hair and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite conditioners. I have natural hair and it is THICK. Because of the density and amount of hair, I have issues combing through it without proper slip provided by high quality conditioners. There would be no way I could comb my hair without the help of conditioner. This conditioner is inexpensive, smells amazing, and provides all the slip in the world. I would recommend this product to all people who have trouble combing their hair, those with natural hair, and those who like great smelling hair products. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Alcantara

customer_reviews.title: Undefeated Champion of Conditioners
customer_reviews.text: I am not knew to the Giovanni Smooth as Silk conditioner or some of the other products. Giovanni is the only product, were majority of it's line works for my hair: I have been using and knowing about the Tea tree triple treat shampoo, and the direct leave in for years. The Smooth as Silk deep conditioner is hands down the best, with natural ingredients and affordable. Of course I'll order again, unless they change the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Leave In
customer_reviews.text: Curly Girl, 3b low porosity curls. Perfect moisture and consistency. Light, when you rub in hands does turn white but goes away once applied. Smell is fine, it doesn't linger but that's not a bad thing because I usually layer it with a styling product curly, natural hair ladies know what I'm talking about. Great deal for 3 bottles. Has become one of my favorite leave in, great for wash and go. It is also good for the summer months when we need our curls hydrated. Will definitely recommend and repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lily C.

customer_reviews.title: My new "go to" conditioner for frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: I always love Giovanni hair care products. They are made with good ingredients that are effective to maintaining a luxurious head of hair. So when Giovanni came out with these new lines of hair care products I had to try them. And while each of lines is great. I particularly like this one because it specifically addresses my frizzy hair. While it does have a light scent to it....I suspect it is naturally occurring from the exotic oil blend in this conditioner. So it should not be bothersome to those who avoid perfumed or fragranced products.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Prima

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail product!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: moisturizing, light weight, light scent, good value, plays well with other products, detangles, no build up, clean ingredients, good price, simple packaging Cons: may have too much protein for low porosity hair Bottom line: Works well on 2c/3A curls to add some moisture and smoothe out frizz without crunch or grease. If you require gorgeous packaging, this isn’t for you. If you care more about the contents in the bottle, though, give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Believe me, I tried almost ALL of the Giovanni 2Chic Shampoos AND Conditioners, and this conditioner is the best, hands down! It leaves my hair conditioned, soft, and moisturized, but not heavy. Smells nice, and the good thing is the scent does not linger in your hair. This is the only conditioner that doesn't leave my hair sticky feeling. So glad I found this!! By the way, the matching Shampoo is the only 2Chic Shampoo I didn't try, the reason being that is contains silicones. Those are not good for your hair. The conditioner is great though. I use it with the 2Chic UltraSleek Shampoo and it is a great combination.
customer_reviews.author: kel858

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: The pic is what my hair looked like when it air dried after using the shampoo and conditioner. Looks gross, doesn’t it? I’m updating my review because I ended up using the rest of the shampoo and conditioner since it’s non-returnable. I’m skeptical because it has no scent and it didn’t seem to have any effect, it doesn’t moisturize my hair like at all. The conditioner has no slip so I can’t detangle my hair in the shower. So I use them to dilute my expensive ones which works fine for the time being. But alone these products just don’t do well.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina S

customer_reviews.title: Great product! One of my faves now
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the best leave in I've ever used. I had heard good things about it years ago but it was $22 per bottle then on average so I couldn't justify buying it but at this much more affordable price I tried it. I've been using it for about 2 months and I love it. a little goes a long way and it softens the hair for a long time without the greasy feeling. Seems to play nicely with gels as well. My hair is 3C/ 4A (mostly 4A) if that helps anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware before purchase. Phenoxyethanol, which is a known ...
customer_reviews.text: Beware before purchase. Phenoxyethanol, which is a known irritant, is listed on the bottle as an ingredient but not listed on the ingredients list on this page. I had to return after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.H. Sy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Soft. Smooth. Silky. My hair had to get used to this product and some hair fell out simply from going from a highly processed cheap shampoo and conditioner to an organic high quality one. However, a month in my hair has never been healthier, smoother, or more vibrant. It also smells awesome all day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Giovani hair products. I have 4b-4c hair and find their products leave my hair soft and manageable. I purchased the shampoo and condition from another suplier and when I saw this 3-pack deal, I had to go for it. Huge mistake. This conditioner left my hair feeling heavy and caused shedding. I question whether this is a genuine Giovani product. I will not be purchasing from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great smell, nice moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this stuff smells. At the moment my hair is pretty long and going through a particularly dry spell (it's past my bra and each hair is that wispy-fine type that tends to dry out easily) so no conditioner is strong enough on it's own, so I'm actually using this with a mixture of others, but I notice the difference if I forget to use this one so I know it's good stuff and important for my hair's health. When my hair was an average length I could use this on it's own and it was a good moisturizer alone without leaving my hair greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Justbeachy

customer_reviews.title: Not super impressed but it's okay
customer_reviews.text: I have butt-length, fine, straight, frizzy hair. I tested this and the 2Chic Brazilian Keratin & Argan Oil Ultra-Sleek Conditioner, and the other one worked better to reduce frizz for me. Neither weigh down my fine hair, both rinse clean and reduce tangles, but for my hair the Ultra Sleek conditioner had a greater anti-frizz effect and left my hair feeling softer and more "conditioned". YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The conditioner itself is great. I have used it for years
customer_reviews.text: The conditioner itself is great. I have used it for years. The way this particular product was delivered was substandard and misleading. It came in a bottle that was labeled shampoo, so clearly this was a reused bottle which was filled with conditioner. The pump for the bottle does not work and there was an attempt to seal the pump with a strip of masking tape, which was already torn. If you are going to sell a repackaged product then you should advertise as such.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has a pleasant scent and none of my allergens and made my hair thick and beautiful again!
customer_reviews.text: This has completely changed my hair! I am seriously allergic to palm oil and coconut oil and cocobetatine that's in all shampoos. This has a pleasant scent and none of my allergens and made my hair thick and beautiful again!
customer_reviews.author: skippyrah

customer_reviews.title: I received REAL Giovanni product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smooth as silk conditioner 3 pack, and I can guarantee it's the real stuff. I bought the same conditioner at whole foods to compare, and it was exactly the same. I'm not sure why people are receiving fake items but I know I got the real stuff when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Caliginosity_OW

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I try it sooner???
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner is moisturizing and detangles my hair. It is a staple in my family with my 3 girls loving it to.
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair shiny and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for me. In the shower it sometimes feels like it's still a little tangled but is fine when I get out. My hair is super soft, smooth, and shiny and I've started getting compliments on it since I started using this. For something more on the natural side I really like it. Works really well for my girls as well.
customer_reviews.author: mecan

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Makes hair easy to detangle and soft after washing
customer_reviews.text: I am African-American with natural hair that is about a 4B. I was introduced to this product line for my friend and have loved it ever since. My hair is easy to the table after washing, feels really soft, and combined with the other products stays that way for quite a while. I give this to thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Latesha Grayer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: First off, I LOVE this product. I found this product on a YOUtube channel and had to have it for my daughter. She's been natural since birth and now at 2 years old this conditioner does wonders for her Curly/Fine hair type. This is definitely a staple for us. :) I love how her curls look after using this.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Williams

customer_reviews.title: My most favorite conditioner ever
customer_reviews.text: My most favorite conditioner ever. It have plenty of slip and it adds lots of moisture to my dry, type 3/4 hair. Also works well as a deep conditioner, and it has a very pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: No. C

customer_reviews.title: The real deal, good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the other reviewers may have experienced, but this is not a fraudulent product. I've been using this conditioner faithfully for years through many different merchants since it's one of the few products that works well with my fine hair, and I see no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Frigatebird22

customer_reviews.title: Very silky
customer_reviews.text: Tea Tree has a specific scent that smells more medicinal than anything else. I don't mind it, but what it does for my hair, scent doesn't matter. I love the conditioner. It works well with the shampoo. The shampoo is a clarifying shampoo, so conditioner is needed. The conditioner feels silky, almost luxurious and it doesn't weigh down my hair. I use both at least five days per work and I love how my hair feels. It's very soft, easy to work with (sometimes) and it feels thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Nana1025

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for discontinued St. Ives Hair Repair!
customer_reviews.text: IF you were hooked on (long discontinued) St. Ives Hair Repair Intensive Conditioner Moisture Treatment for Dry Or Damaged hair (white bottle with maroon pump) then get this as an almost perfect replacement. The smell is the same, the feel is the same. Does all the same. I have old bottle of the St. Ives and the ingredients are almost identical. I'll bet St. Ives sold the formula to Giovanni. You'll be very happy if you are former St. Ives customer!
customer_reviews.author: ToTellTheTruth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic conditioner, will put life into your hair again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this conditioner - it's incredibly thick and luxurious. I use it in conjunction with the 2chic shampoo and it's great for my fried hair. It smells lovely, and leaves my hair feeling silky and soft (as opposed to hay-like and frizzy when I don't use this product). Another plus: it's cruelty-free and vegan! I will continue to buy this conditioner and the shampoo that accompanies it, because it's the best thing I have found to save my overly processed hair. My hubby uses it on his beard too!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for afro textured hair
customer_reviews.text: As a natural, one of my favorite go to conditioners. While I don't use this for deep conditioning, it is great for co-washing and sometimes I even leave it in. It makes my hair super soft and super hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Shoptoomuch

customer_reviews.title: horrible products makes my hair dry, hard and ugly
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I am not sure if the reviews are real, I bought the avocado one. I have puffy dry semi wavy semi straight hair. It has been damaged from the hard water In Europe. It did not get better with this and I thought it was because of how damaged my hair was. I did an all natural mask with aloe and oils and my hair felt very good, I put on a bit of the shampoo and as soon as I washing my hair with it, my hair felt all dry! so I put on other products and threw this away! This is horrible for dry hair just makes it dryer, my mom noticed the same thing!!
customer_reviews.author: julie Gautreaux

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: good conditioner! it is nicely balancing. my hair is on the drier side and this keeps it nice. giovanni is great for cruelty free but effective haircare, with lots of vegan products!
customer_reviews.author: ala

customer_reviews.title: Hair is so soft
customer_reviews.text: I love this conditioner, it makes my hair very soft. My only warning would be that it makes my hair so soft that it doesn't tend to hold curls very well, use very little and some product if you want your curls to stay after styling.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna P

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: When I went on vacation I bought a travel size of this conditioner and shampoo at my destination. I LOVED IT! My hair is straight and pretty lifeless. I wouldn't say my hair is too thick or too thin, but it's just simply very flat so I have to add a lot of hairspray everytime after showers to boost my hair. This conditioner and shampoo really gives more life to my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Kaykate

customer_reviews.title: Not for Dyed Hair
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner was ok. It has a lot of protein and foams in your hair like a shampoo. The big problem is that while using the shampoo and this conditioner, my hair color was just washing away. Not just when I first colored it but every single time I washed and conditioned I could see my hair color in the my hands. Good for someone with natural color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this for my curls
customer_reviews.text: As a black female I like to wear my hair natural and this is my favorite conditioner for giving me manageable and beautiful cork screw curls. I used to be to find it in my local store but they stopped carrying it. So happy when I found it on amazon
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I like this conditioner but was hoping the "invigorating" claim would actually be true. I don't get any tingling sensation on my scalp - if anyone knows of a product that does, feel free to reply.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Feels like lotion - seems fake
customer_reviews.text: I'm really annoyed with Amazon and their counterfeits at this point. Everything is so questionable. They need to figure out how to screen these products because I'm literally on the verge or boycotting them all together. This product feels like I'm putting wash out conditioner in my hair. It smells like a lotion from the 80s - old. Not like grapefruit or whatever it claims to be. It's disgusting how many products I've seen to be counterfeit on here.
customer_reviews.author: FeliciaChantal

customer_reviews.title: best conditioner for fine, curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: I typically have this on Subscribe and Save via Amazon. This is by far the best conditioner for my fine, curly hair that is prone to tangling. I use it alone as a Co-Wash and my hair feels clean and I don't notice a major build-up. The key for me is that I can easily put a shower comb through it without too much hair shedding. This is major plus for me and the reason I will keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Leave In
customer_reviews.text: I love this light weight leave in. It's glycerin free and has film forming humectants which is a must for my hair and where I live. I wish I could get this on auto ship because I don't want to be without!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Horrible  Product  9/16/19  purschased!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves oil heavy residue buildup in hair makes my hair hard. My hair is sleeve shoulder length this product is far the worst product ever used. I get my hair Keratin treated usually use far more expensive products this is awful don't buy. I bought the conditioner plus shampoo makes my hair feel as if there's candy stuck in it after a shower in full use. I bought this on September 16th, 2019 tried to do a return they denied honoring a return beware filled with oil damaging to hair won't allow cuticles too breath horrible product misrepresented in advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Angel  OA

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite leave-in conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite leave-in conditioner. I have really curly hair, and I'm super picky with what I use. My hair dresser throughout the years has tried different products to keep my hair looking smooth and feeling soft. Once he tried Giovanni's Direct Leave-In Conditioner, I needed to look no further. It smells pretty, it keeps my hair soft, looking smooth, and helps add some weight to my curls so when I let my hair out my hair goes down not up. If you're debating just to try this product, I suggest that you do because you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katastrophe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this conditioner!!! It's not heavy at all and it's very moisturizing..leaves my damaged fine hair feeling very soft!!!! Only conditioner I use now!!!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I loved IT!
customer_reviews.text: I loved IT!!! RECOMMENDED for CURLY Hair! This is it girls. I was so doubtful about this conditioner at first, but it left my hair so hydrated and soft with a natural looking shine. Another plus is that it smells good. The conditioner is not crazy thick, which I love. I don't even know what else to say. It's an affordable price and effective. It's totally worth buying. I WILL BE BUYING THIS AGIAN!
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this product SO much I hope they do not change one ingredient! I love that is does not have any silicone and that panthenol is an ingredient high in the list! Please keep the ingredient exactly the same, it's repairing my hair slowly but surely and makes it feel soft.
customer_reviews.author: GlanzTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Rat's Nest
customer_reviews.text: While this conditioner felt like it had a good bit of "slip", my loosely curly hair was full of snarls when I got out of the shower. I had to use an anti-tangle product, which I do not have to use with my less expensive conditioners. The scent was pleasant and the pump/packaging was great, but I prefer my conditioner to actually detangle, defrizz, and moisturize.
customer_reviews.author: pookatunie

customer_reviews.title: Very strong fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This is a good conditioner if you're not sensitive to fragrance. I've used other Giovanni products with no issues, but everything I've tried from this line gives me a migraine.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W.

customer_reviews.title: Love the shampoo, conditioner isn't so great
customer_reviews.text: While I love the shampoo and the minty smell and tingle from the tea tree oil, the conditioner is rather runny, not thick like I would expect for this price. That being said, it does moisturize and detangle, it just takes a little more because it feels watered down. I will look for something a little more salon quality in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A's Mom

customer_reviews.title: This is the best conditioner I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best conditioner I've ever used. I have fine hair and the ends used to dry and split easily from heat styling, until I started using this. I get a ballayage once a year too and the color stays true too with this conditioner. Even my hair stylist commented on how great my hair looks and asked what I'm using! I often recieve compliments on the lovely coconut scent and while it's reasonably subtle it lasts. Even on day 2 you'll still smell fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Nnairek

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product.
customer_reviews.text: This was such an amazing deal I just couldn't pass it up. I follow the Curly Girl method of conditioner washing and this is my wash. Great price and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Texasirish

customer_reviews.title: So moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I have super curly hair that is past my bum with tons of layers that gets ridiculously dry and tangled. The 50:50 is my holy grail conditioner that cuts through the tangles and puts moisture back in. I really hope they never quit making this!
customer_reviews.author: MPAK

customer_reviews.title: Great product for hot dry air.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for years and purchased it at High Heath stores then they closed in my area. I found it on Amazon and have been ordering it ever since. Keeps your hair soft, protects it from the high heat of Arizona. Also sold at better price and fast shipping to your door. Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Baroness von Behr

customer_reviews.title: Leaves Hair Greasy-Looking
customer_reviews.text: I've used other Giovanni products in the past, and they've all been fine. But this particular conditioner is terrible. It leaves the hair very greasy. No matter how much I rinse it out, it leaves a greasy residue. Looks worse than if I hadn't washed my hair at all. I will go back to using the Giovanni 50:50.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Fake, wrong smell, absolutely not the right product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, I waited a month for the conditioner and it does not smell like the right product and the packaging is dented... I've used the real products, many of them. This is clearly a fake in a bottle that looks like the right one. AND NO RETURNS fyi
customer_reviews.author: ELF

customer_reviews.title: No silicones, sulfates, parabens, or mineral oil.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. What I love the most is that it doesn't have any silicones, sulfates, or parabens, or mineral oils, & that it's a "safe/healthy green product" on the ThinkDirty app. I love the smell because it smells just like the Camille Rose Naturals conditioner. It smells like Frootie Pebbles.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: I like it as an nautral  ingredient conditioner....
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as a cowash at least 2-3 times a week due to sweaty 4b/4c workout hair. A big hunk in the shower goes a long way with a little water to somewhat 'lather' all over. I finger through all over....no combs. I usually buy the 3 pack for cost savings which is similar to the cost I find in my local Whole Foods when it's on sale there. I can get 2 weeks out of one bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Smells awesome. Clean. Soothing. Even soothing upon the hands. Softening. Smells luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: Panther

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Natural hair keep hair soft.
customer_reviews.text: I've had dreads for over 10 years. I just cut them off 2wks ago read a review on this item best choice i ever made. My hair was very slick and soft while using this conditioner. I ordered a second batch. I now will have 6 all together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a great product
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered this shampoo and conditioner elsewhere and paid double the price that I paid on Amazon. If you haven't used Tea Tree shampoo and conditioner let me recommend it highly. I am of a certain age and my hair was dull, lifeless and seemed to be falling out by the handful. Not anymore. This product is indeed the holy grail of hair products. My hair is shiny, bouncy and thicker than before I begain using it. Don't let the price fool you. It's worth far more than it sells for and I did in fact pay far more until I found it here.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne0711

customer_reviews.title: Nice conditioner but it is not sealed so it leaks during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Every time I order this, it has leaked all over the bag. It's not cheap so I don't like that some of the product I pay for is all over the bag and unuseable. Is it too much to ask that they seal it so it can't leak?
customer_reviews.author: MuhRoads

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. The scent is very light and pleasant and it makes my very course hair feel a lot softer, smoother and more manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J. McCane

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for dense, tightly curled hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My hair is extremely soft and my curls are coming back to life. I use this product as a co-wash and my hair just drinks it up. The product is not heavy and nourishes completely. I have very dense and tightly curled hair - with regular workouts my hair needs as much tlc as possible. This product provides just that and allows me to keep my wash and go hairstyles and extra day or two. Enjoy this product and the results.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, wrong packaging amount x2
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my 4a4b hair. I give this product an overall 3 stars because when I made the order it’s says set of 3 but I only received 1. Called Amazon they tried to send me the right order amount, but I received one again. I didn't call them back. Next time I probably will buy in store.
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Light floral scent when it’s rinsed out, and my my favorite shave lotion
customer_reviews.text: I use this both as a hair conditioner *and* a shaving lotion. I let it set in my hair and move onto shaving my legs with it and by the time I’m done and have rinsed off, my hair smells amazing and the sensitive skin on my legs is left moisturized and soft. I catch whiffs of it in my hair throughout the day as I move around and it’s a nice subtle surprise. Not too strong, but lingers just enough where you don’t get sick of it.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: If you need: Slip, Definition,Shine And Moisture; Get This!
customer_reviews.text: I love this conditioner. It has Slip, Definition,Shine And Moisture. Smells like delicious avocado. It moistures my hair and left it detangled. The packaging is beautiful, easy to hold, to open and to use. This is one of my new grails.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be improving my hair.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a few months now and my hair seems to be coming back in places that had no hair. Also, my original black hair color is coming back. I am taking a prescription from my doctor that has the same herbs as this shampoo. So, the improvement may be a combination of both.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Cooling effect is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: The conditioner is good for people suffering from fragrance irritation. I have had issues with this and finding hair products isn’t easy. The cooling effect of the conditioner is amazing. It helps to relieve any itching or irritation due to environmental factors. The gallon is a nice way to save money and last for 3-4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Use to get small bottles in town, this is way better. Love that it has a pump. Hair feels soft, smells great. Only thing i was disappointed about was the lid unscrewed in shipping and leaked a little in the box. I don't think I lost too much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BRAVO
customer_reviews.text: A dream leave in! Hair is soft, moisturized, free to curl and protected with a great mix of herbal ingredients. Not the only Giovanni product in which I sing praise! Love the gentle almost non-existent clean scent❤️ THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: The holy grail
customer_reviews.text: Favorite shampoo/conditioner combo to date. I use no one else. My hair looks and feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: DevonReinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Giovanni
customer_reviews.text: One of my favs for moisturized natural hair. Being a 4c I'm always looking for conditioners to soften and moisturize my hair. And this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: naturalbeautee21

customer_reviews.title: Great for curls & coils!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Makes me feel like I've been to a luxury salon. My curls get the care they need & it smells so good!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Hartaway

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Results
customer_reviews.text: For many years I assumed that all shampoos and conditioners were pretty much created equal, with some being more expensive simply because of name and packaging. I was very wrong. This conditioner (and the accompanying shampoo) are fantastic. It leaves hair beautifully conditioned and easy to style. It is more expensive, true, than a regular drug store conditioner, but it is soooo worth every penny. And it is FAR less expensive than most other organic conditioners. Recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C.C.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I previously had picked up a small tube of this at my local store. Wow. Seriously this is better than what I have paid 3 times as much for. I have chin length colored and highlighted hair and this totally untangles it and leaves it soft. My teenager who has waist length ombred hair also uses it now. By far the best cruelty free/vegan product I have discovered so far.
customer_reviews.author: Goddard Heriot

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I comb through this conditioner through my ends in the shower with a wide tooth comb. It detangles and moisturizes pretty well. I would repurchase again but I want to try Andalou Naturals next to see if it would be a little more moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my 4b/c Afro textured hair!
customer_reviews.text: Left it on my hair for 15 min without heat and it left my 4b/c hair feeling smoother...hydrated. Before using it, my hair was parched and a little crispy and felt better afterwards. Thumbs way up for this product being natural!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t go well for me. Not enough slip
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 4b/c hair as a leave in. I saw no benefit. It foams quite a bit, and is light which makes it perfect for leaving in. But when i used it felt like my shea moisture jbco Leave in with ACV on the label has better slip. I really wanted it to work. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Makeila

customer_reviews.title: when Giovanni says smooth, I Listen.
customer_reviews.text: You do not have to convince me that this is the best shampoo and conditioner combination that I will ever use, or have ever used. I will be 68 in September, please keep making this product until I die.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Hair feels soft and silky
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shampoo and conditioner, I use the leave in conditioner in the green bottle so thought I would try this! It smells amazing and leaves my hair silky smooth and soft. I have really coarse hair and this still makes my hair feel amazing. There is no greasy feeling after either!
customer_reviews.author: kind of fun but hard

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair which is bleached with highlights. It does an okay job of conditioning and hasn't negatively affected my freshly colored/bleached hair but my hair still ends up kind of frizzy after it dries in comparison to other conditioners I've used. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone with highly processed hair that needs a lot moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner is one of the best I've used. It makes my hair super soft. It's a little pricey and you can get a bigger bang for your buck from the actual Giovanni website but the product itself is amazing! Soft silky hair!!!
customer_reviews.author: 2020Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Will re purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd flavor or this brand. And by far my favorite for adding volume and shine to my hair. I’ve used the orange and the purple flavors. I don’t remember the actually names. Luckily this pink one is actually the cheapest Of them all.
customer_reviews.author: BigAnil

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a different or cheaper product
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product in the salon and it felt/smelt way different than the product I received buying it here off amazon. It’s supposedly the same product, but it definitely doesn’t feel or smell the same. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brieane

customer_reviews.title: The best and only conditioner I will ever use!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many products on my 4BC hair and this is the one that has made the biggest difference in my hair and my life. My hair has never looked or felt as good as it does when I use this conditioner. It makes the bomb twist out and my hair is super easy to comb through. I sometimes use it on my face and it even makes my skin more youthful! I will never buy another conditioner again, I just wish I could get a lifetime supply lol.
customer_reviews.author: lena stuart

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Mess
customer_reviews.text: Nothing extraordinary about this product. It smells nice, and doesn't dry my hair out, so I guess that's good. I like to purchase my haircare products via Amazon, but may have to stop buying Giovanni. This is the THIRD bottle that arrived with leakage!
customer_reviews.author: Dilan Bay

customer_reviews.title: Dry Tangled Hair
customer_reviews.text: The Avocado version is amazing and lead me to try this but it left my hair feeling dry still. I have longer hair and use a little more product than normal but 5-7 pumps with at least five minute leave-in was not getting the job done. Product smells nice- two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Best, most luxurious conditioner ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this conditioner! It is the only one that goes onto my long shampoo matted hair (I use a great tea tree shampoo for my dry scalp, but it leaves my hair very tangled) and detangles like magic. When I put it on it does feel just as it claims, "smooth as silk". It has an excellent "slip" factor. I am able to run my shower comb through it quite easily after distributing it easily through my hair, and I use way less product than my previous conditioners. After drying and styling my hair feels nice and soft also. I have never met another conditioner like it. I will definitely keep buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Winky0205

customer_reviews.title: Actually...
customer_reviews.text: It's better than I thought it would be, I will be purchasing again. It helps to keep my hair moisturized, it's got great slip!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my hair so soft
customer_reviews.text: I love this conditioner. It leaves my hair feeling so soft and smooth. I've been using it in conjunction with the brand's anti-dandruff shampoo (which I'm not a huge fan of when it comes to relieving scalp itch) so I'm sure that also has helped in preventing my hair from drying up.
customer_reviews.author: Carla D.

customer_reviews.title: Soft silky hair!
customer_reviews.text: My hair felt so silky and soft after switching to this sulfate and silicon free shampoo/conditioner. I thought my ends were damaged but it doesn't feel damaged anymore. I probably had silicone buildup in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo and conditioning set for years now( keratin and moroccan argan oil) and my hair has never been better I have very thick long hair wavy that’s definitely tends to get dry and frizz!!! But this leaves my hair looking amazing every time usually find it at a local Marshall’s or TJ Maxx unfortunately they’re closed due to this COVID-19 so I was very thankful to find it on Amazon a little more expensive but worth every penny!!!

customer_reviews.title: I love this leave in for my natural hair
customer_reviews.text: I have really thick, curly hair (type 3c). This stuff works wonders as a leave in. I put other products on top of this for added curl definition, but a little goes a long way. These bottles are very small, though, and I prefer to buy this product in the larger sized bottles. Amazon, unfortunately, does not offer the same size/price as offered from massagewarehouse.com or from TJ Maxx /Marshalls where I buy bulk quantities.
customer_reviews.author: texaspeaches

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. I do not notice any scent, and scent is not a feature that I was looking for. A small dab helps control my fine hair without the need to use heavier mousse, or other hair products.
customer_reviews.author: surftim

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite conditioner. We just moved and can no longer find it in stores so buying it here. A bit pricier than it was in stores, hence the star off, but I still love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dyed or very dry hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I’m well over 50 and with dyed hair you need something super moisturizing. I use it as normal conditioner and add some to the ends of my hair after I’m out of the shower. It’s the perfect weight and really does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jlynnc

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a Broken pump...
customer_reviews.text: The pump was broken upon arrival... when I unboxed it I noticed the bubble wrap and tape around the pump head... I didn't think anything of it... still had a few days left of our current conditioner & so I put it in the closet... Well, tonight I opened the bubble wrap and now I know why it was all taped up... it was broken... it was shipped with a broken pump... The Shampoo didn't have the bubble wrap but maybe it should have; that pump was broken too!!! It had just as much shampoo coming out of the pump base as it did the pump spout!!! Ridiculous!!!
customer_reviews.author: STOGIE

customer_reviews.title: Great product—highly recommend’
customer_reviews.text: This product, along with moisturizing, surprisingly also helped lessen my dandruff and itching. It smells soooo good but also is not overpowering or too pungent. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

product_meta.title: GIOVANNI Direct Leave-In Weightless Moisture Conditioner, 8.5 oz. , Wash & Go, Co Wash, Curls & Wavy Hair, No Parabens, Color Safe (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Style:Conditioner- 3 Pack| Size:8.5 Fl Oz| Color:Direct Leave-In (Grapefruit + Lavender Extract)GIOVANNI Direct Leave-In Weightless Moisture Conditioner restores strength and luster to abused hair while detangling for easy comb-out and styling. Look in the Ingredients section for a listing of *USDA certified organic ingredients.GIOVANNI was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural product stores, and today is the #1 selling Hair Care line in the United States Natural Products Industry. But before there was a brand, there was a pioneer. Arthur Guidotti had a vision and a love for all things hair. He began developing his passion as a hairstylist in Hollywood and Beverly Hills. He worked for a time with hairstylist icon Gene Shacove and was good friends with “the father of hair color,” Al Lapin . By the 1960s, Arthur was maturing his talents and decided to open his own salon, called On Sunset. The salon was a bustling site, on the famous Sunset Strip, and a hit with many Hollywood celebrities, including Lucille Ball . Since 1979 the GIOVANNI Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance. GIOVANNI is committed to creating only the highest-performance formulations, wrapped in aesthetically beautiful packaging and marketed with extraordinary visuals and graphics.
feature_bullets: MOISTURIZING HAIR CARE: GIOVANNI Direct Leave-In Weightless Moisture Conditioner restores strength and luster to damaged and abused hair while detangling for easy comb-out and styling

DEEP CONDITION: Direct Leave-In Weightless Moisture Conditioner uses a rich blend of ingredients that protect hair as you go through the day, creating a texture that feels thicker Infusing each strand with hydration, hair transforms to a beautiful style
COLOR SAFE: GIOVANNI Direct Leave-In Weightless Moisture Conditioner is 100% color-safe, and nourishes hair with a proprietary blend of vitamins and antioxidants without stripping color

VEGAN-FRIENDLY & CRUELTY-FREE: GIOVANNI Products use a number of organic ingredients and are Leaping Bunny Certified cruelty free GIOVANNI Products are never tested on animals and come in sophisticated recyclable packaging
SULFATE-FREE & PARABEN-FREE: GIOVANNI products do not contain any sulphates, parabens or other harsh chemicals commonly used in regular hair products, leaving you with strong, beautiful hair
